summary: btm (Batch to Memory - 4NT, TakeCommand Script) filetype bundle
name: 4NT-Bundle
description:
Updates both the file type and syntax plug-in for btm (Batch to Memory - 4NT, TakeCommand Script) file type Bundle. Includes simple user and omni completion.

Reports errors to: http://code.google.com/p/vim-scripts/issues/list
Discuss improvements on: http://groups.google.com/group/vim_scripts

http://code.google.com/p/vim-scripts/wiki/4NTBundle
install_details: Just install using vimball (vimscript#1502). Check btm_options.vim for options used by this plug-in.

versions.release_notes:
Fixes and new features:

1) Bill McCarthy contributed matchit settings.
2) some loop-keywords where missing.
3) additional minor fixes
